scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd microfrontends/home && npm run dev" "cd microfrontends/novatrace && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd microfrontends/home && npm install && cd ../novatrace && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd microfrontends/home && npm run build && cd ../novatrace && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run copy-microfrontends
scripts.copy-microfrontends: mkdir -p dist/home dist/novatrace && cp -r microfrontends/home/dist/* dist/home/ && cp -r microfrontends/novatrace/dist/* dist/novatrace/
scripts.preview:all: concurrently "npm run preview" "cd microfrontends/home && npm run preview" "cd microfrontends/novatrace && npm run preview"
